name: Skydive 3D LT
description:
What is it like to free fall at 100 mph while trying to avoid random obstacles? Find it out in our newest Skydive 3D Fall Down Game.

After you jumped down to earth you have to change the direction left and right to avoid collisions with the obstacles. The longer you keep alive at your way down, the more points you will earn.

The addictive never ending gameplay that gets harder and harder test you nerves!

Features:
-Cute Graphics
-Easy to learn gameplay
-Very addictive
-Highscore is saved
-Great for your kids too
-One App for all iPhone, iPod and iPad Devices

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
